[Page Title: Maybank Public House | Mt. Pleasant, SC]

Maybank Public House

Restaurant & Tap Room

843-203-6461

1970 Maybank Hwy, Charleston SC 29412

Open Today From 11:30am – 11:00pm
Order Online Food Menu Drink Menu Order Online 
Maybank Public House

Our gift cards are perfect for any occasion! Order a gift card online and we will mail it to the recipient. Gift cards are also available for purchase and can be redeemed at both Maybank and Coleman Public House.
Purchase Gift Card 
Reservations

Reservations for parties of 5 or more are encouraged. Please contact the restaurant and we will be happy to make the proper accommodations. For smaller parties, we recommend taking advantage of our call-ahead seating option. Simply call the restaurant 15-20 minutes prior to your anticipated arrival time. Our host will be happy to add your name to our wait list in advance in order to reduce your wait time.

1970 Maybank HwyCharleston SC 29412
maybankpublichouse@gmail.com 843-203-6461 Contact Us 
Hours
Monday Closed Tuesday 11:30am – 11:00pm Wednesday 11:30am – 11:00pm Thursday 11:30am – 11:00pm Friday 11:30am – 12:00am Saturday 11:30am – 12:00am Sunday 11:30am – 11:00pm
